tool.name: Primer3 to gff
tool.description: Identification and localization of perfect microsatellites as well as compound microsatellites

param.name: p3_out
param.label: Primer3 Output File
param.help: A text file with Primer3-specific instructions. See http://primer3.sourceforge.net/primer3_manual.htm

tool.help:
**Tool Information**
Primer3 to GFF mini-pipeline
**Author**
Primer3: Steve Rozen, Andreas Untergasser, Maido Remm, Triinu Koressaar, and Helen Skaletsky. Whitehead Institute for Biomedical Research URL: http://bioinfo.ut.ee/primer3/primer3web_help.htm#
Primer3 to GFF mini-pipeline: Iyad Kandalaft iyad.kandalaft@agr.gc.ca; Agriculture and Agri-foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
Primer3 to GFF mini-pipeline Galaxy Wrapper: Yuxuan Chen yuxuan.chen@agr.gc.ca; Agriculture and Agri-foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
**Description**
Takes Primer3's output file and converts it to GFF3 format. Limits the number of primers generated per target (default 5).
**Inputs and Outputs**
- Input - Primer3 output file
- Output - Produces a GFF3 format text output
